sqlMap.select: select nvl(count(*),0) from bbs where $searchKey$ like '%' || #searchValue# || '%'

select * from ( select rownum rnum, data.* from( select boardNum,name,subject,depth,hitCount, to_char(created,'YYYY-MM-DD') created from bbs where $searchKey$ like '%' || #searchValue# || '%' order by groupNum desc, orderNo asc) data)
where rnum>=#start# and rnum<=#end#
sqlMap.update: update bbs set hitCount = hitCount+1 where boardNum = #boardNum#
sqlMap.select: select boardNum,name,pwd,email,subject,content,ipAddr,groupNum, depth,orderNo,parent,hitCount,created from bbs where boardNum = #boardNum#

select data.* from ( select boardNum, subject from bbs where ( $searchKey$ like '%' || #searchValue# || '%' ) and ((groupNum>#groupNum#) or (groupNum=#groupNum# and orderNo<#orderNo#)) order by groupNum asc, orderNo desc) data where rownum=1

select data.* from ( select boardNum, subject from bbs where ( $searchKey$ like '%' || #searchValue# || '%' ) and ((groupNum<#groupNum#) or (groupNum=#groupNum# and orderNo>#orderNo#)) order by groupNum desc, orderNo asc) data where rownum=1
sqlMap.update: update bbs set orderNo = orderNo+1 where groupNum=#groupNum# and orderNo>#orderNo#
update bbs set name=#name#, subject=#subject#, email=#email#, content=#content#,pwd=#pwd# where boardNum=#boardNum#
sqlMap.delete: delete bbs where boardNum in (select boardNum from bbs start with boardNum=#boardNum# connect by prior boardNum=parent)
